name: Failing Box
description:
This game is a submission for Wowie Game Jam 3.0 with the theme "FAILURE IS PROGRESS"

The little box is back and now he is inside some sort of dungeon? Lead the little box to the exit of the dungeon! You might need to sacrifice him though.

Control:

  • Left/Right Arrow: Move
  • Up Arrow: Jump, Go to the Portal

Code, art, and most of the audio is done by me, RZFury.
Font used in-game: SG12 by Shakagraphics, Classic by memesbruh03.
Some sound effects are came from opengameart.org.

I hope you enjoy ^^
